00015 /// \file
00016 /// Provides the MachineId class.
00017 
00018 #ifndef __MACHINEID_HPP
00019 #define __MACHINEID_HPP
00020 
00021 /// An unique Machine ID.
00022 /**
00023  * This is just a dummy implementation for which every ID is equal.
00024  * Platform specific code should have the 'real' implementation of this class.
00025  * 
00026  * It should initialize itself to something unique, and have == and != operators.
00027  */
00028 class MachineId {
00029     
00030     public:
00031         
00032         bool operator == (MachineId const & m) const {
00033             return true;
00034         }
00035         
00036         bool operator != (MachineId const & m) const {
00037             return false;
00038         }
00039         
00040 };
00041 
00042 #endif
